price: They are content to be with those helpless who stay behind[71]; their hearts have been sealed, so that they do not understand.
arabic: رَضُواْ بِأَن يَكُونُواْ مَعَ ٱلۡخَوَالِفِ وَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَفۡقَهُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: raḍū bi-an yakūnū maʿa al-khawālifi waṭubiʿa ʿalā qulūbihim fahum lā yafqahūna
